title: Hard Case
description: Ex member of Royal Canadian Mounted Police who joined the DEA but got fired, moves to a beach resort town in Florida and opens a detective agency with a spunky ginger local tourist agent. They help a cop from Philly to find a killer.

title: Fowl Play
description: Nick and Sylvie help animal activist stop a group of dangerous animal smugglers.

title: Death's a Beach
description: Nick and Sylvie talk about how they met. Sylvie hired him to help her find a yacht she rented to a man who went missing along with the boat.

title: Family Affair
description: A man hires Nick to locate his brother because their mother is dying. When Nick finds him, the man claims that he has no brother and his mother is already dead. That's when the man who hired him and pulls a gun and takes him with him. Nick later learns that the man he was looking for was in witness protection and the man who hired him is a hit man sent to take care of him.

title: Roll of the Dice
description: A businessman is opening a casino with his shady partners. Sylvie falls in love with him and leaves her detective job to work for him. What she doesn't realize is that she's just a chip in a deadly game.

title: Double Time
description: A meek owner of a company that deals with diamonds, hires Nick and Sylvie to find out if his hot unhappy flirty wife is having an affair. When her angry lover murders her in front of Nick and Sylvie's eyes, it's all clear. Or is it?

title: Forget Me Not
description: Ian, the owner of the small popular local beach bar Tropical Heat and Nick's friend, convinces Nick to help a pretty woman with amnesia who he just met. The more they find out about her past, the less she wants to remember it.

title: For a Song
description: Ian's old girlfriend and former band mate shows up out of nowhere. She needs money, so she wants him to sell the rights to their band's hit songs. Is she really in dire need or is there something else going on?

title: Marissa
description: A strange woman hires Nick to stop her husband who wants to murder her. However, after some investigating, Nick finds evidence that she might be insane. But what if she isn't?

title: The Mariah Connection
description: Nick's partner from his DEA days needs his help to catch a druglord who's operating in Nick's backyard, Key Mariah.

title: Mafia Mistress
description: Nick meets his old flame Maria again. They start hanging out, but the rekindled relationship goes sour when he finds out about her ties to the mob.

title: A Perfect .38
description: Nick and Sylvie investigate a string of murders tied to the local beauty contest.

title: Dead Men Tell
description: A client asks Nick and Sylvie to help her grandfather locate a legendary lost pirate treasure.

title: Big Brother Is Watching
description: A woman hires Nick and Sylvie to find her missing son. Her missing husband may have something to do with it. Turns out that someone is after the parents as well.

title: This Year's Model
description: A model hires Nick to stop a blackmailer who has some photos of her that she doesn't want to go public. Nick finds the blackmailer dead. Is he being used by the model or is there a third party that's involved in all this?

title: Writer Wrong
description: A jazz player has been murdered. Nick investigates. A writer who wants to write a book about the case is shadowing him.

title: Runaway
description: A woman hires Nick to track down her sister who stole a highly dangerous poisonous substance from a lab.

title: Sex, Lies and Lullabies
description: Sylvie becomes a target of a deranged serial killer.

title: She
description: An old flame of Nick's shows up. She's the one who cost Nick his job with the DEA. Nick is willing to let bygones be bygones, but it seams that death follows her and not the accidental kind.

title: Tara, Tara, Tara
description: A woman hires Nick to find her missing husband, a weapons system specialist.

title: Abandoned
description: A woman hires Nick and Sylvie to find her mother who abandoned her 20 years ago. They track her down to a psychiatric clinic that offers therapy to businesspeople. To find her, Nick and Sylvie, posing as a couple, join a therapy group.

title: Deceit
description: A businessman hires Nick to protect him from his wife who he believes is trying to kill him.

title: Party Girl
description: A candidate for Governor hires Nick and Sylvie to investigate the accusations that his son raped a woman.

title: Double Fault
description: An insurance company hires Nick and Sylvie to investigate if the wife of a man recently found decapitated and the sole beneficiary of his life insurance, had something to do with it. Nick's friend Spider, Tropical Heat owner, is introduced.

title: Alive and Kicking
description: Nick is shot by a drug dealer. A crazed actress finds him and takes him to her house to tend to his wounds. Then she imprisons him there to have someone to love her forever. Days later, Sylvie and Spider, now worried sick, try to find him.

title: Tattooed Lady
description: A rape victim hires Nick and Sylvie to track down the man who violated her, a serial rapist who marks all of his victims with a tattoo.

title: Users
description: A man hires Nick to protect his daughter who's involved with a dangerous arms dealer. However, it turns out that she was sent undercover to get close to the guy by a group who wants to stop the arms dealer and his trade.

title: Frame Up
description: Nick is framed for double murder.

title: Going to the Dogs
description: Someone is trying to assassinate a club owner. Since he's a friend of Nick and Sylvie's, he asks the duo to check whether or not his biggest competitor has something to do with it.

title: Dial 9 for Murder
description: Sylvie goes undercover to work at a telephone sex line company. One of the workers was murdered, and a potential suspect is calling the girls again.

title: Twice as Dead
description: A woman hires Nick and Sylvie to find out what happened to her husband who, unknowingly to her, faked his own death some years ago, but turned up dead again recently, this time for real.

title: Deadly Switch: Part 1
description: A woman dies under suspicious circumstances at her dentist's. Her business partner receives the money from her life insurance. Then the money goes missing and more dead bodies turn up.

title: Deadly Switch: Part 2
description: Nick is finally able to put the pieces of this complex case together, but he may have met his match this time.

title: Over My Dead Body
description: Nick gets seriously injured and Sylvie must care for him.

title: White Hot
description: Nick is hired to find a little girl whose father took the girl from her mother and fled with the child to Israel.

title: Stranger in Paradise
description: Nick and Sylvie go to work undercover in a private school where a female student was murdered.

title: The Pro and the Con
description: Nick wants to prove that a famous football player did not kill one of the financial advisers who ruined him financially.

title: Don't Say Nothin' Bad About My Baby
description: Spider's ex girlfriend shows up out of nowhere and asks him to protect her from her abusive boyfriend. When the boyfriend is found dead, and stolen money comes into the picture, Nick is the only one who can straighten this mess out.

title: Ocean Park
description: Nick is hired to find the person who murdered the husband of a scientist who studied dolphins with him in the local aquatic park.

title: Jack of Diamonds
description: Nick's deadbeat con artist father is arrested for the murder and robbery of a local socialite. Nick, although quite jaded about his dad, decides to look into the matter.

title: His Pal Joey
description: Joey, a girl Nick once helped, now needs help again when she witnesses a murder.

title: Grasping at Shadows
description: Nick saves the new Tropical Heat bar waitress from being kidnapped by Middle Eastern spies. He and Sylvie contact an expert on the matter which turns out not to be such a great idea.

title: The Last of the Magnificent
description: One of Nick's favorite actors is shooting a western. After some strange accidents, he hires Nick and Sylvie to go on the set undercover and try to determine what is going on. Spider joins them on the job.

title: The Patsy
description: An Englishman is being blackmailed, possibly by his vengeful former partner in crime. He and his wife hire Nick to get to the bottom of things.

title: May Divorce Be with You
description: A couple filing for divorce hires Nick and Sylvie separately. The husband hires Sylvie to prove his wife's infidelity, while the wife hires Nick to prove her husband's infidelity.

title: Feedback
description: A woman who's cheating on her husband with a young lover is being blackmailed. She hires Nick to help her, but it might be too late to prevent a tragedy.

title: Basic Black
description: When Nick's old P.I. colleague is found dead, he gets the dead colleague's strange case that involves a wealthy property developer.

title: Born Tomorrow
description: A businessman hires Nick to find his missing wife. The man's colleagues may know something about her disappearance.

title: Object of Desire
description: An eyewitness falls for Nick when he stops an armed robbery at a store. She decides to help him identify the robber she saw fleeing from the store. There's just one problem - she might be seeing things.

title: Royal Pain
description: The 6th Duke of Stowbridge accidentally murders his lover. No one knows about it except his wife who, fearing for her own safety, asks Nick for help.

title: Poison Ivy
description: Nick is hired to find a woman who got hold of a new deadly drug. As his search progresses, Nick begins to wonder if he was actually hired to find the drug itself.

title: Massage in a Bottle
description: A nurse has been murdered. Doctor who worked with her may be the perpetrator. Nick is on the case, but someone is one step ahead of him.

title: Mutiny and the Bounty
description: Spider gets involved with an unstable bounty hunter couple.

title: Seen at the Crime
description: Nick and Sylvie are hired to protect a food critic whose life may be in serious danger. Unfortunately, they fail. Then a psychic shows up claiming to have seen more deaths that are in connection with this case.

title: You Stole My Heart
description: Everyone are after the transplanted heart of a powerful crime lord.

title: Gunshy
description: Sylvie shoots and kills a perp. Her world shatters when she is told that the dead man was an undercover cop and she ends up in jail. Nick refuses to believe that the shooting was unjustified and investigates the cop's background.

title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
description: Nick must stop a contract killer.

title: Spider's Tale
description: While in the company of friends, Spider tells a tale of one of Nick and Sylvie's cases the way he remembers it.

title: Turning Screws
description: A gang tricks Nick into helping them commit a robbery. He gets arrested immediately. While Sylvie and Spider ask around outside, he looks for members of the gang among the other prisoners.

title: Tess
description: A woman uses Nick to get rid of her husband - permanently.

title: Deal of a Lifetime
description: A man blackmails Nick to force him to participate in a casino heist.

title: Katie's Secret
description: Katie, Sylvie's niece, arrives in town. She is suppose to work as a model. A murder interrupts her plans.

title: Slumming It
description: A woman who owns local slums hires Nick to investigate her son's girlfriend. Nick soon questions whether he's working for the right people.

title: Man with the Midas Touch
description: A con man cheats one of Nick's friends out of his retirement fund. Nick decides to help his friend return the favor. What they don't know is that the mob is involved.

title: Forbidden Fruit
description: A successful businessman fights with his wife a lot. When she is found dead, he is the prime suspect, so he hires Nick and Sylvie to prove his innocence. His business partner and even his kids are among the other potential suspects.

title: Smut and Nothin' But
description: Nick and Sylvie are hired by an insurance company to investigate a porn mogul who bought life insurance for one of his girls just before she was murdered. As Nick and Sylvie soon find out, the hole goes much deeper than that.
